channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Announcing the GA Release of the OpenAPI Plugin for .NET and Python in Semantic Kernel】宣布语义内核中适用于 .NET 和 Python 的 OpenAPI 插件正式发布
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce the General Availability (GA) release of the OpenAPI package for Semantic Kernel, available for both .NET and Python! With this significant milestone, developers can easily integrate existing APIs as plugins, enhancing the capabilities of their AI agents while making them more versatile in real-world applications. Why OpenAPI Plugins Matter In […]】我们很高兴地宣布语义内核 OpenAPI 包的通用版 (GA) 版本，可用于 .NET 和 Python！凭借这一重要的里程碑，开发人员可以轻松地将现有 API 作为插件集成，增强人工智能代理的功能，同时使它们在实际应用中更加通用。为什么 OpenAPI 插件在 [...]

item.title: 【In C++, how can I make a default parameter be the this pointer of the caller?, revisited】在C++中，如何使默认参数成为调用者的this指针？，重温
item.description: 【Expanding on the previous pattern.】在之前的模式上进行扩展。

item.title: 【Announcing the GA Release of Filters for .NET and Python in Semantic Kernel】宣布在语义内核中全面发布 .NET 和 Python 过滤器
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the General Availability (GA) release of Filters for our .NET and Python Semantic Kernel! This vital enhancement strengthens the control and visibility developers have when running functions, ensuring responsible AI practices are instilled from the ground up. Filters not only improve security but also contribute to building enterprise-ready solutions that […]】我们很高兴地宣布我们的 .NET 和 Python 语义内核的过滤器正式发布 (GA)！这一重要的增强增强了开发人员在运行功能时的控制力和可见性，确保从头开始灌输负责任的人工智能实践。过滤器不仅可以提高安全性，还有助于构建企业就绪的解决方案，[...]

item.title: 【How can I detect which menu my item was invoked from?】如何检测我的项目是从哪个菜单调用的？
item.description: 【Just give them all different IDs. But this might itself by an XY problem.】只需给他们不同的 ID 即可。但这本身可能是由 XY 问题造成的。

item.title: 【Announcing TypeScript 5.7】发布 TypeScript 5.7
item.description: 【Today we excited to announce the availability of TypeScript 5.7! If you’re not familiar with TypeScript, it’s a language that builds on JavaScript by adding syntax for type declarations and annotations. This syntax can be used by the TypeScript compiler to type-check our code, and it can also be erased to emit clean, idiomatic JavaScript […]】今天，我们很高兴地宣布 TypeScript 5.7 推出！如果您不熟悉 TypeScript，它是一种基于 JavaScript 构建的语言，添加了类型声明和注释的语法。 TypeScript 编译器可以使用此语法对我们的代码进行类型检查，也可以删除它以发出干净、惯用的 JavaScript [...]

item.title: 【Java Intelligent Application Templates in the Azure AI Gallery】Azure AI 库中的 Java 智能应用程序模板
item.description: 【Artificial Intelligence (AI) is no longer a futuristic concept—it’s transforming how developers build and innovate applications today. To help Java developers harness the full potential of AI, Microsoft’s Azure AI App Templates gallery offers a growing collection of AI-powered application templates. These templates are designed to streamline development, showcase integration patterns, and accelerate your AI […]】人工智能 (AI) 不再是一个未来概念，它正在改变当今开发人员构建和创新应用程序的方式。为了帮助 Java 开发人员充分利用 AI 的潜力，Microsoft 的 Azure AI 应用程序模板库提供了越来越多的 AI 支持的应用程序模板。这些模板旨在简化开发、展示集成模式并加速您的 AI [...]

item.title: 【Customer Case Study: Announcing the Microsoft Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch Connector】客户案例研究：推出 Microsoft Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch Connector
item.description: 【Today we’re excited to feature the Elastic team to share more about their Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch connector. Read the entire announcement here. I’ll turn it over to Srikanth Manvi to dive into it. In collaboration with the Microsoft Semantic Kernel team, we are announcing the availability of Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch Vector Store connector for Microsoft Semantic Kernel (.NET) users. […]】今天，我们很高兴邀请 Elastic 团队分享有关其 Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch 连接器的更多信息。请在此处阅读整个公告。我会把它交给 Srikanth Manvi 来深入研究。我们与 Microsoft Semantic Kernel 团队合作，宣布向 Microsoft Semantic Kernel (.NET) 用户推出 Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch Vector Store 连接器。 […]

item.title: 【Making you more productive with Visual Studio v17.12】使用 Visual Studio v17.12 提高您的工作效率
item.description: 【The 12th update to Visual Studio 2022 is packed with lots of exciting new features that users have been asking for! Here are some of the awesome highlights from this release that are some of my personal favorites. For all the details, be sure to check out our release notes. Copy from the Error List […]】Visual Studio 2022 的第 12 次更新包含许多用户一直要求的令人兴奋的新功能！以下是此版本中的一些精彩亮点，也是我个人最喜欢的一些。有关所有详细信息，请务必查看我们的发行说明。从错误列表复制[...]

item.title: 【Introducing the enhanced MSSQL Extension for Visual Studio Code】介绍 Visual Studio Code 的增强型 MSSQL 扩展
item.description: 【The MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code is designed to support developers in building applications that use Azure SQL (including Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and SQL Server on Azure VMs), SQL Database in Fabric (Preview) or SQL Server as backend databases. With a comprehensive suite of features for connecting to databases, designing […]】Visual Studio Code 的 MSSQL 扩展旨在支持开发人员构建使用 Azure SQL（包括 Azure SQL 数据库、Azure SQL 托管实例和 Azure VM 上的 SQL Server）、Fabric 中的 SQL 数据库（预览版）或 SQL Server 作为后端的应用程序数据库。具有用于连接数据库的全面功能套件，设计[...]

item.title: 【Top 5 GitHub Copilot Features in Visual Studio from Microsoft Ignite 2024】Microsoft Ignite 2024 中 Visual Studio 中的 5 大 GitHub Copilot 功能
item.description: 【At this year’s Microsoft Ignite, it was truly exciting to see Scott, Dalia, and Jessie demo some of the most innovative features of GitHub Copilot that are transforming the developer experience in Visual Studio. From the breakout session, we highlighted five standout features that are pushing productivity to the next level. Whether you’re working on […]】在今年的 Microsoft Ignite 大会上，看到 Scott、Dalia 和 Jessie 演示了 GitHub Copilot 的一些最具创新性的功能，这些功能正在改变 Visual Studio 中的开发人员体验，这确实令人兴奋。在分组讨论中，我们重点介绍了将生产力提升到新水平的五个突出功能。无论您正在从事[...]
